text: Marquis Teague (born February 28, 1993) is an American professional basketball player who currently plays for the Chicago Bulls of the NBA. He was one of the top rated high school basketball players in the class of 2011. Teague was born on February 28, 1993 in Indianapolis, Indiana. ==Other websites== *Kentucky Bio *NBADraft.net Profile *Scout.com Profile *Rivals.com Profile Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Chicago Bulls players Category:Sportspeople from Indianapolis
title: Marquis Teague
